Constructor & Destructor Documentation

phys::ConeTwistConstraint::ConeTwistConstraint ( btConeTwistConstraint *  Constraint  ) 

Internal constructor.

Constructs this class around a pre-built bullet constraint. This is an internal only constructor and shouldn't be called manually.

Parameters:
Constraint The constraint to be constructed around.

void phys::ConeTwistConstraint::SetParam ( int  num,
Real  value,
int  axis = -1 
) [virtual]

Provides override of constraint parameters.

Parameters such as ERP and CFM can be altered with this function. Optionally provide axis.

Parameters:
num The parameter to override.
value The new value for the parameter.
axis Optional axis.

Implements phys::TypedConstraint.
